children.title: Status
children.query: service =~ "cpu%" or service =~ "memory%" or service =~ "fd%" or service =~ "load%" or service =~ "disk%"

children.title: Network
children.query: service =~ "%tx err%" or service =~ "%rx err%" or service =~ "%tx drop%" or service =~ "%rx drop%"

children.title: UDP rate
children.query: service =~ "riemann server%" and service =~ "%udp%" and service =~ "%rate%"

children.title: TCP rate
children.query: service =~ "riemann server%" and service =~ "%tcp%" and service =~ "%rate%"

children.title: WS rate
children.query: service =~ "riemann server%" and service =~ "%ws%" and service =~ "%rate%"

children.title: HDFS
children.query: service =~ "hadoop%fsnamesystem%" and (service =~ "%m.totalload" or service =~ "%m.capacityused" or service =~ "%m.capacityremaining" or service =~ "%corruptblocks%" or service =~ "%m.underreplicatedblocks" )

children.title: HDFS Ops
children.query: service =~ "hadoop%namenodeactivity%" and (service =~ "%fileinfoops" or service =~ "%deletefileops" or service =~ "%createfileops" or service =~ "%addblockops")

children.title: Basic info
children.query: service =~ "%zookeeper%" and (service =~ "%connections%" or service =~ "%requests%" or service =~ "%data_size%" or service =~ "%server_state%" or service =~ "%version%")
